page.title: 09TRANSPORT
page.content: {OVERVIEW TRANSPORT 0425-0428 0825-0828 The significant fact that the area is sandwiched between the M1 (west),A6 (east) and Luton (south) means that the B579 and the minor road to Chalton take a heavy burden of commercial traffic wanting access to the M1 junction at Toddington (020297).In addition to the minor route is a direct link for commuters from Houghton Regis to Luton and Sundon Park (0525) to the A6,so peak hour traffic can cause conjestion.Public transport exists along both minor roads including two "country roads". The London-Bedford, electrified line has no significant effect though it runs through the SW corner. Bramingham Rd also takes heavy triffic to the A6 and Bedford. The new development are likely to necessitate a link road from (080265) to (040261).
